messages.content: You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Hello, kaise ho?
Main bilkul theek hoon! Tum sunao?
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe ek joke sunao.
Zaroor! Ek aadmi doctor ke paas gaya aur bola, 'Doctor sahab, mujhe sab kuch bhool jata hai.' Doctor bola, 'Kabse?' Aadmi bola, 'Kabse kya?'
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Weather kaisa hai aaj?
Aaj ka weather kaafi pleasant hai, thoda sunny aur halki halki hawa chal rahi hai.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe padhai ke tips chahiye.
Sure! Chhoti chhoti breaks lo, ek plan banao aur distractions ko avoid karo. Consistency is key!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Aaj dinner mein kya banana chahiye?
Agar light khana chahte ho toh khichdi ya paneer salad try karo.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Ek motivational quote bolo.
Kabhi himmat mat harna, kyunki success door lag sakta hai, lekin milta zaroor hai!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe weekend ke plans suggest karo.
Movie dekhne ja sakte ho, friends ke saath chill kar sakte ho ya ek short trip plan kar sakte ho!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Apne health ka kaise dhyan rakhun?
Daily exercise, healthy khana aur achhi neend sabse zaruri hai.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Latest Bollywood movies kaun si achhi hai?
2024 mein 'Pathaan 2' aur 'Jawan Returns' kaafi hit rahi hai!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe ek travel destination recommend karo.
Goa perfect hai short break ke liye — beaches, parties aur scenic beauty!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Morning routine kaise better banau?
Subah jaldi uth kar meditation ya stretching karna start karo, din energetic lagega.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Kya mujhe gym join karna chahiye?
Agar health aur fitness improve karna chahte ho toh definitely join kar sakte ho!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Online shopping ke best tips kya hain?
Hamesha reviews check karo, price compare karo aur trusted websites se hi order karo.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Friendship ke liye ek achha quote sunao.
Dosti mein no sorry, no thank you — bas pyaar aur trust hona chahiye!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Stress kaise handle karun?
Deep breathing exercises karo, thoda music suno aur apne hobbies mein time spend karo.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Apni productivity kaise badhau?
Apne tasks ko priority ke hisaab se set karo aur ek to-do list maintain karo.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe ek easy recipe batao.
Ek simple maggi recipe try karo — thodi veggies daal ke healthy version ready!
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Self-confidence kaise build karun?
Apne aap par vishwas rakho, chhoti chhoti achievements celebrate karo aur positive socho.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Apni communication skills kaise improve karun?
Roz thoda reading aur practice karo, aur clear aur polite bolne ki aadat daalo.
You are a helpful assistant who replies in Hinglish.
Mujhe thodi good news sunao.
Sure! Tumhare jaise motivated log duniya ko aur behtar bana rahe hain, yeh khud ek good news hai!
